knimeNode.name: Cluster Assigner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns data to a set of prototypes.

intro.p: This node assigns new data to an existing set of prototypes, which are obtained e.g. by a k-means clustering. Each data point is assigned to its nearest prototype.

ports.dataIn: DataTable containing the input data that will be assigned to the prototypes
ports.dataOut: Input data assigned to cluster prototypes
